|brand = Proxim |model = AP-600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = HZB-G11FNF, HZB-B11FNF, MCLJ07H06904, HZB-C38WCW, HZB-A13QBF |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Motorola;MPC8241;MPC8241LZQ166D; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Power |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 166<!-- 166 / 450 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;E28F640J3A-120; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Winbond;W986432DH-6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = ADMtek;AN983B; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |totlan = <!-- total lan ports --> |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:20:A6 |oui = 00:20:A6
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = DIN
|serial = yes,, DE-9 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 169.254.128.132 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = public |defaultssid = My Wireless Network A |defaultssid_regex = ^My Wireless Network A$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/18/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Proxim G11FNF |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR5212A; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5111; |rad1chip3 = Atheros;AR2111; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== These access points have three different models.. *[[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-600a|AP-600a]] (802.11a only), FCC ID: HZB-A13QBF, [[Atheros]] AR5001A module :[[Ambit Microsystems T60H677]] 802.11ab (??) *[[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-600b|AP-600b]] (802.11b only), FCC ID: HZB-B11FNF, ORiNOCO Ruby card *[[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-600|AP-600bg]] (802.11bg only), FCC ID: HZB-G11FNF, [[Atheros]] AR5001G module :[[Proxim G11FNF]] [[Atheros]] AR5001G 802.11bg
"P/N: 141310120002E REV: 02 MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the main board. :"J07H069.02 REV: 7" and "0307" (02/2003) is silkscreened on the module board. :*[[Ambit Microsystems J07H069.02]] ([[User:Omega/Board PN#Foxconn (+ Ambit Microsystems)|Foxconn]]) ::Module manufactured by [[Ambit]] / [[Foxconn]] / ''Hon Hai'' :Uses an uncommon combination of AR5212 + AR5111 + AR2111 for 802.11bg only. *There may also be an a/b/g version of this device (FCC ID: HZB-C38WCW). :"U59H007 REV: 1" and "0329" (07/2003) is silkscreened on the module board. :*[[Ambit Microsystems U59H007.01]] 802.11abg (??) U59H010.01 :*[[Ambit Microsystems J07H069.01]] 802.11abg (??) [[Proxim 8482-WD v1]] See also [[Foxconn Wireless Adapters]]..
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/proxim-orinoco-ap-600-80211-abg-access-point-148 On SpeedGuide.net] :To reset the unit to factory defaults hold the '''Reload''' button :for 10 seconds while the unit is running. :To erase the firmware and require reload via TFTP, hit '''Reset''' :while the unit is running and then hit '''Reload''' for 20 seconds.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Proxim AP-600 board top.jpg|board top File:Proxim AP-600 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Proxim AP-600 cpu.jpg|CPU shot </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
